EmailTemplate.name: Administration Training
EmailTemplate.subject: ISM Administration Training.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Parents Could you please note, that the whole of the administration team will be in training and therefore the uniform shop and accounting department will not be available during the following periods: Friday (Oct 28) 9 am – 12 pmWednesday (Nov 2) 9 am – 12 pmWednesday (Nov 2) 4-5 pm We apologise for any inconvenience. Best Regards Mr Dino Vikas
